title: Self-Service E-mail update
name: auth0-email-update
author: CriGoT
description: Provides a simple way for database users to update their own e-mail address

AUTH0_CLIENT_ID.description: Client ID of the application registered in the Auth0 tenant.

AUTH0_CLIENT_SECRET.description: The application secret used to validate the tokens.

AUTH0_CONNECTION.description: Name of the database connections that the users belong to.

AUTH0_MANAGEMENT_TOKEN.description: Token to acces the Managment API v2 with scope including read:users and update:users.
